channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: A deadly combination of unpredictable weather makes the Atigun Pass more dangerous than ever with slippery conditions and a risk of avalanches; Jack Jesse calls on friend Carey Hall to help haul a pair of 46,000-pound tanks worth $300,000.

channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Everyone pushes to the limit to get freight to Deadhorse before the season ends in three weeks; Lisa rushes to pick up her next load before joining a convoy north with Jack Jesse; Hugh and Alex discover a fellow fierce competitor on the road.
